name: Suir Blueway VR Canoeing Experience
description:
-- Currently in Early Production --  

The Suir Blueway VR Canoeing Experience aims to give users the users a taste of what it's like to canoe a part of the beautiful River Suir found in Tipperary.  The project is seeking to increase participation in canoeing with overall the goal to entice users to get on the river for real. 

Features:

  • Paddle At Your Own Pace
  • Experience Beautiful Irish Nature  & Scenery
  • Minigames 
  •  Training & Safety

(Please note that as this project is early in production there may be missing features, bugs may occur and some areas may be bare / unfinished)

-- SUBMIT FEEDBACK --

Please submit feedback through the > 2min form below. This is a long-term ongoing project that we hope to shape via user experience.

https://forms.gle/krryb24FBfatTMFt6
